alert.note: Alert for Central Highlands; East Slopes Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Estancia Valley; Guadalupe County; Northeast Highlands; Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Sandia, Manzano Mountains Including Edgewood; Southern Sangre de Cristo Mountains (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 31 at 8:28AM MST until December 31 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph. * WHERE...Sangre de Cristo Mountains, Sandia and Manzano Mountains including Edgewood, Estancia Valley, Central Highlands, Northeast Highlands, and Guadalupe County. * WHEN...Until 6 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs may be blown down. Expect strong crosswinds on area roadways.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Central Highlands; East Slopes Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Estancia Valley; Guadalupe County; Northeast Highlands; Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Sandia, Manzano Mountains Including Edgewood; Southern Sangre de Cristo Mountains
